Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the optical power of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: At 60 K, the threshold current-density was measured as ~3000 A/cm2 with a peak-power output of ~35 mW.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the heterostructure of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The QCL's structure incorporates a four-well pattern within the GaAs/Al0.15Ga0.85As material platform.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the design type of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The latest breakthrough in laser technology is resonant-phonon terahertz quantum-cascade lasers operating at a heat-sink temperature of 175 K, surpassing all previous records.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the optical power of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: In cw operation, a 400-mm-wide and 4-mm-long laser produced an optical power of 250mW with a threshold current density of 3000 A/cm2 at a temperature of 150K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the heterostructure of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: This result is achieved by using the alternative material combination In0.53Ga0.47As/GaAs0.51Sb0.49, lattice-matched to InP, which exhibits fabrication advantages over standard In0.53Ga0.47As/In0.52Al0.48As due to more suitable material parameters.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: When the temperature is increased to 100 degrees Celsius, the continuous wave output power sets a new record at 18.2 W.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: By pushing the limits, we were able to achieve a maximum heatsink temperature of 178 K for our InGaAs-based THz QCLs, resulting in unparalleled performance.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The most efficient 4.5-mm-long device operating at 5.37 THz has a low threshold current density of 340 A/cm2 at 25 K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the optical power of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: 0.5 mW of peak cw power was measured by the thermopile detector (ScienTech, model AC4000) placed next to the cryostat window, from a single facet collected with a Winston cone with a circular opening of 2.75 mm diameter.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: Despite having a smaller radiative oscillator strength, this terahertz QCL achieved a record-breaking pulsed Tmax of 217 K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: In pulsed operation, the heatsink temperature (Tmax) of the device reached up to 220 K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: At the lasing frequency of 5.3 THz, 90 mW of peak optical power was measured at 3 K, and approximately 3 mW could still be detected at 185 K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the design type of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: Our exhibit showcases the continual usage of terahertz quantum cascade lasers, which operate at a frequency of 3.2 THz and utilize a bound-to-continuum active area along with a semi-insulating surface-plasmon waveguide design.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the heterostructure of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The device's chosen quantum cascade module is designed with a five-well GaAs/Al0.25Ga0.75As composition to effectively suppress leakage current.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the heterostructure of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: A nine-well period has been incorporated into the QCL, consisting of a InAs/InP material system.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the optical power of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: A remarkable output power of 0.23 W was attained by Terahertz quantum cascade lasers in continuous wave mode, breaking previous records.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: In cw operation, this device lased up to Tmax=100K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the design type of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The implementation of a bound-to-continuum active region and a high-resistivity surface-plasmon waveguide design enabled the continuous operation of 11.8 THz quantum cascade lasers with great success.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the design type of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The resonant LO phonon scheme, which is a combination of resonant tunneling across the collector barrier and efficient scattering of longitudinal-optical (LO) phonons into level 1, enables reinjection into the next module.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the optical power of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: Record-breaking output power of 0.23 W was achieved for Terahertz quantum cascade lasers in continuous wave mode.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: In continuous operation, the device reached a maximum heatsink temperature (Tmax) of 300 K.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: When studying three lasers with target frequencies of 3.36 and 3.92 THz, utilizing GaAs/AlAs heterostructures, we detected a blue shift in the emission frequency from the center to the edge of the wafer.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the heterostructure of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: Creating a multilayer heterostructure (MH), we focused on achieving optimal oscillator strength of 0.425 by utilizing a three quantum well GaAs/Al0.15Ga0.85As active module with diagonal transitions.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: A 7.3 THz quantum cascade laser (QCL) utilizing a scattering-assisted injection and resonant-phonon depopulation strategy has been successfully implemented.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The latest generation of GaAs/AlGaAs quantum cascade lasers, featuring twelve quantum wells, have achieved an impressive frequency of 8.9 THz in testing.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: The heat-sink temperature of 180 K proved to be optimal for achieving maximum efficiency in our quantum-cascade lasers during our preliminary experiments.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the working temperature of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: By combining this fabrication with an improved active region design, operation of a 3 THz QCL is observed up to 164 K in pulsed mode and 117 K in cw mode.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: With a pulse-mode capability and heat-sink temperature of 144 K, the QCL stands out from previously reported THz QCLs that are limited to operation around 2 THz.

Instruction: From the following sentence, please extract the lasing frequency of the Quantum Cascade Semiconductor laser device. Print none if the value does not exist in the input text
input_text: At a frequency of 3.9 THz, the laser exhibited an optical power peak of 63 mW at a low temperature of 5 K, and could be detected at 5 mW even at a higher temperature of 180 K.
